Top-3 Scripts:
ul_92461: import --help

import -window Iftop ss.jpg

count=0;
while ((1)); do
    iftop &
    pid=$!
    sleep 1  # make sure iftop is up
    count=$(($count+1))
    import -window Iftop iftop_sshot$count.jpg
    kill $pid
    sleep 5
done
